ShortDescription: Reduce a creature or object to dust.

Name: Dragon Form
ShortDescription: Turn into a dragon.

Name: Elemental Confluence
ShortDescription: Summon a confluence of elementals of all four elements.

Name: Field of Life
ShortDescription: Create a vital energy field that heals those who remain within.

Name: Field of Razors
ShortDescription: Fill an area with a tangle of razor wire.

Name: Flame Vortex
ShortDescription: Invoke a moving tornado of fire and wind.

Name: Frost Pillar
ShortDescription: Freeze a creature in a pillar of ice.

Name: Lignify
ShortDescription: Turn a creature to wood.

Name: Mislead
ShortDescription: Turn invisible and create a duplicate of yourself who acts like you.

Name: Nature's Reprisal
Area: all squares on the ground that contain plants in an 80-foot burst
ShortDescription: Anger plant life to slow and damage creatures.

Name: Necrotize
ShortDescription: Necrotize a foe's body, harming and randomly debilitating them.

Name: Never Mind
ShortDescription: Stupefy a creature permanently.

Name: Personal Ocean
ShortDescription: Surround yourself in a bubble of water.

Name: Petrify
ShortDescription: Turn a creature into a stone statue.

Name: Phantasmal Calamity
ShortDescription: Create visions of an apocalypse to damage creatures mentally.

Name: Phantom Orchestra
ShortDescription: An invisible orchestra damages with bursts of sound.

Name: Poltergeist's Fury
ShortDescription: Become the center of a storm of telekinetic fury

Name: Purple Worm Sting
ShortDescription: Damage a creature and infect it with purple worm venom.

Name: Repulsion
ShortDescription: Prevent creatures from approaching you.

Name: Righteous Might
ShortDescription: Turn into a battle form with divine armaments.

Name: Scintillating Safeguard
Targets: up to 5 willing creatures who would be harmed by the triggering effect
ShortDescription: Reactively protect multiple creatures from harm with a magic barrier.

Name: Spellwrack
ShortDescription: Curse a creature to be harmed when a spell is cast on it and lower the duration of its spells.

Name: Spirit Blast
ShortDescription: Damage a creature's spiritual essence.

Name: Stone to Flesh
Targets: petrified creature or human-size stone object
ShortDescription: Turn a creature turned to stone back to flesh.

Name: Suspended Retribution
ShortDescription: See disaster in the future that strikes when the target takes a specific action

Name: Tangling Creepers
ShortDescription: Entangle creatures in a burst and concentrate to lash out with immobilizing vines.

Name: Tree of Seasons
ShortDescription: Grow a tree with four explosive seedpods.

Name: Truesight
ShortDescription: See through illusions and physical transformations.

Name: Unexpected Transposition
Targets: 1 creature other than the triggering enemy
ShortDescription: React to switch places with a creature.

Name: Vampiric Exsanguination
ShortDescription: Draw blood and life force from creatures in a cone, harming them and healing yourself.

Name: Vibrant Pattern
ShortDescription: Make a pattern of lights that dazzles and blinds creatures who enter the area.

Name: Vitrifying Blast
ShortDescription: Glass shards cut creatures and turn them glass-like.

Name: Wall of Force
ShortDescription: Create an invisible and durable plane of magical force.

Name: Wall of Metal
ShortDescription: Shape a wall made of a particular metal.

Name: Zealous Conviction
ShortDescription: Instill unshakable conviction and zeal in willing creatures.

Name: Angel Form
ShortDescription: Transform into an angel battle form.

Name: Beheading Buzz Saw
ShortDescription: Lop heads off with a flying buzz saw.

Name: Contingency
ShortDescription: Set up a spell to trigger later under your choice of circumstances.

Name: Corrosive Body
ShortDescription: Turn your body into living acid.

Name: Cosmic Form
ShortDescription: Turn into a battle form based on the sun or moon.

Name: Dancing Fountain
ShortDescription: Tap a splendid fountain with majestic displays you command.

Name: Deity's Strike
ShortDescription: Enormous deific weapon falls onto a foe from the sky.

Name: Divine Decree
ShortDescription: Creatures opposing your deity's will are damaged, enfeebled, or banished.

Name: Divine Vessel
ShortDescription: Take on aspects of a servitor of your deity.

Name: Duplicate Foe
ShortDescription: Create a temporary duplicate of an enemy to fight for you.

Name: Eclipse Burst
ShortDescription: Explode a globe of darkness that deals cold damage, hurts the living, and overcomes light.

Name: Energy Aegis
ShortDescription: A creature gains resistance to acid, cold, electricity, fire, force, sonic, vitality and void damage.

Name: Execute
ShortDescription: Pull a living creature toward death or an undead creature toward destruction.

Name: Fiery Body
ShortDescription: Turn your body into living flame.

Name: Force Cage
ShortDescription: Form a prison of pure magical force.

Name: Frigid Flurry
ShortDescription: Turn into slashing snowflakes and fly in a straight line.

Name: Heaving Earth
Targets: 1 creature or object on the ground
ShortDescription: Make a shockwave that pushes creatures in the way and explodes when it reaches a target.

Name: Hungry Depths
ShortDescription: Open a door to corrupted water that damages and consumes.

Name: Inexhaustible Cynicism
ShortDescription: Make creatures paranoid and cynical.

Name: Mask of Terror
ShortDescription: A creature's fearsome illusory appearance frightens observers.

Name: Momentary Recovery
ShortDescription: Take some simple actions in the same instant that you teleport

Name: Pollen Pods
Area: four unoccupied 5-foot squares, each of which is at least 20 feet apart
ShortDescription: Cultivate trap-like pollen bulbs that explode.

Name: Prismatic Armor
ShortDescription: Multicolored armor dazzles foes and protects against many damage types.

Name: Prismatic Spray
ShortDescription: Shoot rainbow beams that have various effects on creatures in a cone.

Name: Project Image
ShortDescription: Make an illusion of yourself you can cast spells through.

Name: Regenerate
ShortDescription: Creature heals over time, regrows organs, and reattaches body parts.

Name: Retrocognition
ShortDescription: Sense impressions of past events at your location.

Name: Shadow Raid
ShortDescription: A swarm of illusory shadows damages foes in the area and provides concealment.

Name: Shock to the System
Targets: 1 living creature or 1 corpse that died within the last round
ShortDescription: Lightning revives and revitalizes.

Name: Sunburst
ShortDescription: A globe of sunlight deals fire damage, hurts undead, and overcomes darkness.

Name: Telekinetic Bombardment
ShortDescription: Hurl large objects with your mind

Name: Tempest of Shades
Duration: until the end of your next turn
ShortDescription: Summon an incarnate tornado of undead shades to drain and frighten foes.

Name: Time Beacon
Duration: until the end of your turn
ShortDescription: You create a beacon in time, intending to return to it if things go wrong.

Name: True Target
Duration: until the start of your next turn
ShortDescription: Make multiple attacks against a creature especially accurate.

Name: Unfettered Pack
ShortDescription: Let creatures avoid environmental hindrances.

Name: Vacuum
ShortDescription: Inhale to steal breath from creatures around you.

Name: Visions of Danger
ShortDescription: Create a vision of horrid, swarming creatures that causes mental damage.

Name: Volcanic Eruption
ShortDescription: Cause massive lava sprays that burn creatures and encase them in rock.

Name: Warp Mind
ShortDescription: Confuse a creature, possibly permanently.

Name: Arctic Rift
ShortDescription: Bitter cold damages and freezes a creature.

Name: Boil Blood
ShortDescription: Boil a foe's blood.

Name: Burning Blossoms
ShortDescription: A tree fascinates enemies and burns creatures that stay beneath it.

Name: Canticle of Everlasting Grief
ShortDescription: Sing a mournful dirge that frightens and mentally damages a foe, preventing its bonuses.

Name: Clone Companion
ShortDescription: Create a duplicate animal companion that mirrors your companion's actions.

Name: Desiccate
ShortDescription: Pull moisture from creatures, damaging them.

Name: Disappearance
ShortDescription: Make a creature invisible, silent, and undetectable by special senses.

Name: Divine Armageddon
ShortDescription: Call on your deity to bring about a cataclysm.

Name: Divine Aura
ShortDescription: Allies in an aura have better defenses and are protected against one alignment.

Name: Divine Inspiration
ShortDescription: Spiritual energy recovers a creature's expended spell.

Name: Dream Council
Targets: up to 12 creatures you know by name and have met in person
ShortDescription: Communicate through a shared dream.

Name: Earthquake
ShortDescription: Shake the ground with a devastating earthquake.

Name: Falling Sky
ShortDescription: Telekinetically smash flying creatures to the ground

Name: Ferrous Form
ShortDescription: Turn your body into iron.

Name: Migration
Targets: you and up to 5 willing creatures
ShortDescription: Turn creatures into swift-moving animals.

Name: Moment of Renewal
ShortDescription: Give a creature a day's worth of recovery in an instant.

Name: Monstrosity Form
ShortDescription: Turn into a powerful monster.

Name: Prismatic Wall
ShortDescription: Form a protective wall with seven chromatic layers.

Name: Punishing Winds
ShortDescription: A cyclone inhibits flight and traps creatures.

Name: Quandary
ShortDescription: Trap a creature in an extradimensional puzzle.

Name: Rainbow Fumarole
ShortDescription: Vent multicolored gases to burn and debilitate.

Name: Scintillating Pattern
ShortDescription: Cause an array of color that dazzles, confuses, and stuns.

Name: Spirit Song
ShortDescription: Sing an eldritch song that damages any creature that has a spirit.

Name: Spiritual Epidemic
ShortDescription: Weaken a target with a communicable curse.

Name: Summon Archmage
Duration: until the end of your next turn
ShortDescription: Summon an incarnate archmage to fire magic missiles, stupefy foes, and tear away their spells.

Name: Summon Deific Herald
Duration: until the end of your next turn
ShortDescription: Summon an incarnate representative of your deity, with effects depending on alignment.

Name: Summon Elemental Herald
Duration: until the end of your next turn
ShortDescription: Summon an incarnate elemental to create a natural disaster.

Name: Uncontrollable Dance
ShortDescription: Overcome a target with an allconsuming urge to dance.

Name: Unrelenting Observation
Targets: 1 creature of object tracked and up to 5 other willing creatures
ShortDescription: You and other creatures track a subject exactly using scrying.

Name: Whirlpool
ShortDescription: Create a vortex of waves.

Name: Whirlwind
ShortDescription: Create a moving tornado to damage creatures and raise them into the air.

Name: Bilocation
ShortDescription: Exist in two places at once

Name: Falling Stars
ShortDescription: Call down four pieces of the heavens to deal bludgeoning and elemental damage.

Name: Foresight
ShortDescription: Danger sense warns you when a creature is in danger and protects it with good fortune.

Name: Implosion
ShortDescription: Make a creature collapse in on itself.

Name: Magnetic Dominion
Targets: any number of creatures wearing metal armor, creatures made of metal, creatures that have the metal trait, and unattended metal objects
ShortDescription: Reposition metal creatures and creatures in metal armor.

Name: Massacre
ShortDescription: Instantly kill multiple creatures

Name: Metamorphosis
ShortDescription: Fluidly change between different forms.

Name: Nature's Enmity
ShortDescription: Turn animals, plants, and weather against creatures of your choice.

Name: One with the Land
ShortDescription: Merge into a natural feature to control the nearby environment.

Name: Overwhelming Presence
ShortDescription: Assume the majesty of a god.

Name: Phantasmagoria
ShortDescription: Frighten, deal mental damage, and possibly kill many targets.

Name: Prismatic Sphere
ShortDescription: Form a protective sphere composed of seven chromatic layers.

Name: Proliferating Eyes
ShortDescription: You implant a contagious, scrying eye that spreads to others by touch.

Name: Resplendent Mansion
Duration: until the next time you make your daily preparations
ShortDescription: Conjure a mansion that lasts for a day.

Name: Summon Draconic Legion
Duration: until the end of your next turn
ShortDescription: Summon an incarnate legion of dragons to destroy your foes.

Name: Telepathic Demand
ShortDescription: Send a mental message that impels a creature toward a course of action.

Name: Unfathomable Song
ShortDescription: Song debilitates creatures in weird and powerful ways.

Name: Unspeakable Shadow
ShortDescription: Transform a creature's shadow into a frightening monster and make them flee or fight it.

Name: Voracious Gestalt
ShortDescription: Create a spirit gestalt that eats souls and grows stronger.

Name: Wails of the Damned
ShortDescription: Scream, draining the living and causing void damage.

Name: Weapon of Judgment
ShortDescription: Form a weapon to enforce war or peace.

Name: Wrathful Storm
ShortDescription: Create and control a massive storm.

Name: Alter Reality
ShortDescription: Warp reality to duplicate occult spells.

Name: Avatar
ShortDescription: Transform into a battle form with benefits determined by your deity.

Name: Cataclysm
ShortDescription: Call an instant, devastating cataclysm.

Name: Element Embodied
ShortDescription: Turn into a massive elemental.

Name: Fabricated Truth
ShortDescription: Make creatures believe something is factual.

Name: Fated Confrontation
ShortDescription: Isolate two fated opponents and let them twist each other's fate.

Name: Freeze Time
ShortDescription: Briefly stop time for everything but you.

Name: Indestructibility
Duration: until the start of your next turn
ShortDescription: Become briefly immune to everything.

Name: Manifestation
ShortDescription: Flexibly cast a 9th-rank spell from your tradition.

Name: Miracle
ShortDescription: Ask for a blessing to duplicate divine spells.

Name: Nature Incarnate
ShortDescription: Turn into a massive avatar of nature.

Name: Nullify
ShortDescription: React to automatically counteract a spell and take backlash damage.

Name: Primal Herd
Targets: you and up to 5 willing targets
ShortDescription: Transform willing creatures into mammoths.

Name: Primal Phenomenon
ShortDescription: Request for nature to duplicate primal spells.

Name: Revival
Targets: dead creatures and living creatures of your choice within range
ShortDescription: Heal creatures in an area and return the dead to life temporarily.

Name: Shadow Army
ShortDescription: Duplicate yourself to have your shadows fight enemies as you hide amongst them.

Name: Wish
ShortDescription: Make a wish to duplicate arcane spells.

Name: Agile Feet
Duration: until the end of the current turn
ShortDescription: The blessings of your god make your feet faster and your movements more fluid.

Name: Airburst
Targets: all creatures and unattended objects in the area
ShortDescription: A blast of wind wildly pushes everything nearby.

Name: Ancestral Memories
ShortDescription: The memories of long-dead spellcasters grant you knowledge in a specific skill.

Name: Ancestral Touch
ShortDescription: You touch a creature and force them to see and feel the ancestors surrounding you.

Name: Ancient Dust
ShortDescription: You cough up a cloud of gray soil.

Name: Angelic Halo
ShortDescription: You gain an angelic halo with an aura that increases allies’ healing from the heal spell.

Name: Animal Allies
ShortDescription: Summon animals to briefly attack adjacent foes.

Name: Animate Rope
Targets: up to 50 feet of rope or a nonliving rope-like object
ShortDescription: Command a rope to move and tie as you wish.

Name: Appearance of Wealth
ShortDescription: You create a brief vision of immense wealth filling the spell's area.

Name: Arms of Nature
Targets: 1 wooden object or plant of at least 4 Bulk
ShortDescription: All wood, dead or alive, is your armory.

Name: Ashen Wind
ShortDescription: You conjure a swirling wind of ashes that blows through the area.

Name: Athletic Rush
ShortDescription: Your body fills with physical power and skill.

Name: Bit of Luck
ShortDescription: You tilt the scales of luck slightly to protect a creature from disaster.

Name: Blood Ward
ShortDescription: Your patron's aegis descends to shield a target from harm.

Name: Boost Eidolon
ShortDescription: You focus deeply on the link between you and your eidolon and boost the power of your eidolon's attacks.

Name: Brain Drain
ShortDescription: You probe the target's mind to glean knowledge.

Name: Cackle
ShortDescription: With a quick burst of laughter, you prolong a magical effect you created.

Name: Call of the Grave
ShortDescription: You fire a ray of sickening energy.

Name: Call to Arms
ShortDescription: You cry out a call to arms, inspiring your allies to enter the fray.

Name: Celestial Accord
Targets: 2 creatures that each have an unfriendly or worse attitude toward the other
ShortDescription: You intervene in a heated disagreement between two creatures, encouraging them to put aside their differences and find some common ground.

Name: Charming Push
Duration: until the start of your next turn
ShortDescription: You push at the target's mind to deflect their ire.

Name: Charming Touch
Targets: 1 creature that could find you attractive
ShortDescription: You infuse your target with attraction, causing it to act friendlier toward you.

Name: Clinging Ice
ShortDescription: Freezing sleet and heavy snowfall collect on the target's feet and legs, dealing 1d4 cold damage and other effects depending on its Reflex save.

Name: Cloak of Shadow
ShortDescription: You drape the target in a mantle of swirling shadows that make it harder to see.

Name: Command
Duration: until the end of the target's next turn
ShortDescription: Bid a creature approach, run, drop something, lie prone, or stand up.

Name: Cornucopia
ShortDescription: Vines twine into a wicker horn in your hands, and out spills a single fruit, nut, or similar small bit of produce.

Name: Counter Performance
ShortDescription: Your performance protects you and your allies.

Name: Courageous Anthem
ShortDescription: You inspire yourself and your allies with words or tunes of encouragement.

Name: Creative Splash
ShortDescription: A deluge of paint or colorful illusions descend on the area, reflecting your personal creative specialty.

Name: Crushing Ground
ShortDescription: You tear open the ground then slam it shut.

Name: Cry of Destruction
ShortDescription: Your voice booms, smashing what's in front of you.

Name: Dazzling Flash
ShortDescription: You raise your religious symbol and create a blinding flash of light.

Name: Death's Call
ShortDescription: Seeing another pass from this world invigorates you.

Name: Detect Alignment
ShortDescription: See auras of a chosen alignment.

Name: Detect Poison
ShortDescription: Determine whether an object or creature is poisonous or venomous.

Name: Diabolic Edict
ShortDescription: You issue a diabolic edict, demanding the target perform a particular task and offering rewards for its fulfillment.

Name: Dim the Light
ShortDescription: You magnify the darkness from the triggering effect, causing the ambient light level to flicker briefly so you can slip from sight.

Name: Dimensional Assault
ShortDescription: You tumble through space, making a short dimensional hop to better position yourself for an attack.

Name: Discern Secrets
ShortDescription: Your patron deigns to whisper a few secrets.

Name: Disguise Magic
ShortDescription: Mask the aura of a spell or item.

Name: Distortion Lens
ShortDescription: You create a magical lens that distorts space as best suits you.

Name: Diviner's Sight
Duration: until the end of your next turn
ShortDescription: You glimpse into the target’s future.

Name: Draconic Barrage
ShortDescription: You shape energy into one incorporeal tiny dragon that flits around you.

Name: Dragon Claws
ShortDescription: Vicious claws grow from your fingers.

Name: Earthworks
ShortDescription: With a ripple of earth, you raise small barriers from the ground.

Name: Efficient Apport
Targets: 1 unattended object of light Bulk or less
ShortDescription: Walking over to an item to pick it up is so much effort.

Name: Elemental Betrayal
ShortDescription: Your patron uses its superior command of the elements, empowering them to undermine your foe.

Name: Elemental Counter
ShortDescription: Use a countering element to protect against a spell.

Name: Elemental Toss
ShortDescription: With a flick of your wrist, you fling a chunk of your elemental matter at your foe.

Name: Elysian Whimsy
ShortDescription: You overwhelm the target with an unexpected and unpredictable desire if it fails a Will save.

Name: Evil Eye
ShortDescription: Your patron's resentment manifests in a baleful, envious gaze.

Name: Evolution Surge
ShortDescription: You flood your eidolon with power, creating a temporary evolution in your eidolon's capabilities.

Name: Exchange Image
ShortDescription: Trade appearances with the target.

Name: Extend Boost
ShortDescription: You focus on the intricacies of the magic binding you to your eidolon to extend the duration of your _boost eidolon_ or _reinforce eidolon_ spell.

Name: Face in the Crowd
ShortDescription: While in a crowd of roughly similar creatures, your appearance becomes bland and nondescript.

Name: Faerie Dust
ShortDescription: You sprinkle magical dust in the spell’s area, making those within easier to trick.

Name: Fire Ray
Duration: until the end of the target's next turn
ShortDescription: A blazing band of fire arcs through the air, lighting your opponent and the ground they stand upon on fire.

Name: Flashy Disappearance
ShortDescription: You create a puff of colorful smoke that quickly disperses while you become temporarily invisible.

Name: Flense
ShortDescription: With a touch, you strip off the flesh, muscle, and internal organs off your target, leaving only bare bones.

Name: Forbidden Thought
ShortDescription: You place a psychic lock in a foe's mind that prevents it from a specific action.

Name: Force Bolt
ShortDescription: You fire an arrow-shaped bolt of force, one of the most common and reliable forms of battle magic.

Name: Force Fang
ShortDescription: You briefly turn your attack into pure force to bypass your opponent's defenses.

Name: Forced Mercy
ShortDescription: You soften the target's blows, ensuring they avoid vital areas and cause no lasting harm.

Name: Forge
ShortDescription: Developed before the introduction of the Iron Lagoon, this cantrip for superheating metal has also found valuable combat use.

Name: Fortify Summoning
ShortDescription: As you call a creature to your side, your magic transforms its body, heightening its ferocity and fortifying its resilience.

Name: Friendfetch
ShortDescription: You shoot out ephemeral, telekinetic strands that drag each target directly toward you, stopping in the closest unoccupied space to you in this path.

Name: Genie's Veil
ShortDescription: With a flourish, you fulfill a creature's wish for protection, bending reality to keep them from harm.

Name: Glass Shield
Duration: until the start of your next turn
ShortDescription: Protect yourself with a glass shield.

Name: Glimpse Weakness
ShortDescription: You glimpse a loose scale, a seam in a foe's armor, or a similar weakness, aiding your allies in landing a precise hit.

Name: Glowing Trail
ShortDescription: Your movements leave a vague glowing path behind you, like a misty echo of your presence.

Name: Glutton's Jaw
ShortDescription: Your mouth transforms into a shadowy maw bristling with pointed teeth.

Name: Gravitational Pull
ShortDescription: Pull one or more creatures towards you using gravity.

Name: Gravity Weapon
ShortDescription: You build up gravitational force and funnel it into your blows, leading to more powerful attacks with blade and bow alike.

Name: Gritty Wheeze
ShortDescription: You exhale desiccating grit and sand in a small cloud.

Name: Guided Introspection
ShortDescription: You guide the target in examining their innermost feelings, their behaviors, and the motivations behind their actions, granting them clarity and insight.

Name: Hallowed Ground
ShortDescription: One small space becomes inhospitable to undead as you fill it with life-infused benevolent magic.

Name: Hand of the Apprentice
ShortDescription: You take advantage of one of the most fundamental lessons of magic to levitate and propel your weapon.

Name: Heal Animal
ShortDescription: You heal an animal's wounds, restoring 1d8 Hit Points to the target.

Name: Heal Companion
ShortDescription: You heal your animal companion's wounds.

Name: Healer's Blessing
ShortDescription: Your words bless a creature with an enhanced connection to vital energy.

Name: Hurtling Stone
ShortDescription: You evoke a magical stone and throw it, with divine guide to your aim.

Name: Hymn of Healing
ShortDescription: Your glorious singing mends wounds and provides a temporary respite from harm.

Name: Ignite Ambition
ShortDescription: You strengthen the target's ambition, increase its resentment of its allies, and make its allegiances more susceptible to change.

Name: Imaginary Weapon
ShortDescription: You create a simple weapon of force.

Name: Incendiary Aura
ShortDescription: You surround yourself with a combustible aura.

Name: Inside Ropes
ShortDescription: You pull a large handful of guts from your midsection.

Name: Jealous Hex
ShortDescription: You draw forth a hag’s innate jealousy to deny a target its greatest attribute.

Name: Join Pasts
ShortDescription: Share thoughts and experiences with allies.

Name: Ki Rush
ShortDescription: Accelerated by your ki, you move with such speed you become a blur.

Name: Ki Strike
ShortDescription: You focus your ki into magical attacks.

Name: Lay on Hands
Targets: 1 willing living creature or 1 undead creature
ShortDescription: Your hands become infused with positive energy, healing a living creature or damaging an undead creature with a touch.

Name: Liberating Command
ShortDescription: You call out a liberating cry, urging an ally to break free of an effect that holds them in place.

Name: Life Boost
ShortDescription: Life force from your patron floods into the target, ensuring they can continue doing your patron's will for just a little longer.

Name: Life Link
ShortDescription: You forge a connection of life energy between you and your target, distributing harm between both of you.

Name: Lift Nature's Caul
ShortDescription: With a wave of the hand, you cause the targets to see the world around them as if a gauzy film had been lifted away to expose the truth that lies below their perceived reality.

Name: Lingering Composition
ShortDescription: You add a flourish to your composition to extend its benefits.

Name: Loremaster's Etude
ShortDescription: You call upon your muse's deep mysteries, granting the target a greater ability to think and recall information.

Name: Magic Aura
Duration: until the next time you make your daily preparations
ShortDescription: Change how an item's magic appears to detecting spells.

Name: Magic Hide
ShortDescription: Your animal companion grows a thicker hide, matted fur, or a harder shell, granting it a +1 status bonus to AC.

Name: Magic's Vessel
ShortDescription: A creature becomes a divine receptacle for pure magical energy.

Name: Moonbeam
ShortDescription: You shine a ray of moonlight.

Name: Needle of Vengeance
ShortDescription: A long, jagged needle jabs into the target foe's psyche whenever it tries to attack a creature your patron holds in special regard.

Name: Nettleskin
ShortDescription: Thorns sprout from your body; they pass through and don't damage any clothing or armor you wear.

Name: Nudge Fate
ShortDescription: The barest spin of your patron's spool is enough to alter fate.

Name: Nudge the Odds
ShortDescription: Cheat at gambling.

Name: Nymph's Token
ShortDescription: You grant an ally a token of favor.

Name: Overselling Flourish
ShortDescription: You make a grand spectacle out of getting hit.

Name: Overstuff
ShortDescription: Huge amounts of food and drink fill the target.

Name: Patron's Puppet
ShortDescription: At your unspoken plea, your patron temporarily assumes control over your familiar.

Name: Perfected Mind
ShortDescription: You meditate upon perfection to remove all distractions from your mind.

Name: Personal Rain Cloud
ShortDescription: You conjure a 5-foot-wide rain cloud that follows the target wherever it goes.

Name: Phantasmal Minion
ShortDescription: Create a creature of force to perform minor tasks.

Name: Phase Familiar
ShortDescription: Your patron momentarily recalls your familiar to the ether, shifting it from its solid, physical form into a ghostly version of itself.

Name: Physical Boost
Duration: until the end of the target's next turn
ShortDescription: You temporarily improve the target’s physique.

Name: Practice Makes Perfect
ShortDescription: The target gains a +2 status bonus to the triggering check, or a +3 bonus if the target has master or better proficiency in the skill.

Name: Protective Wards
ShortDescription: You expand a ring of glyphs that shields your allies.

Name: Protector's Sacrifice
ShortDescription: You protect your ally by suffering in their stead.

Name: Purifying Icicle
ShortDescription: You evoke life essence into the form of water and freeze it, then launch the icicle at a foe.

Name: Pushing Gust
ShortDescription: Giving the air a push, you buffet the target with a powerful gust of wind; it must attempt a Fortitude save.

Name: Read Fate
ShortDescription: You attempt to learn more about the target's fate in the short term, usually within the next day for most prosaic creatures, or the next hour or less for someone likely to have multiple rapid experiences, such as someone actively adventuring.

Name: Reinforce Eidolon
ShortDescription: You focus deeply on the link between you and your eidolon and reinforce your eidolon's defenses.

Name: Rejuvenating Flames
ShortDescription: You create a gout of flame that both heals and burns.

Name: Rising Surf
ShortDescription: You create a wave of water that you ride, banking around obstacles and surfing to higher ground.

Name: Savor the Sting
ShortDescription: You inflict pain upon the target and revel in their anguish.

Name: Scholarly Recollection
ShortDescription: Speaking a short prayer as you gather your thoughts, you're blessed to find yourself pointed in the right direction.

Name: Scouring Sand
ShortDescription: You blast the area with grit that scours away soil and gets into creatures’ eyes.

Name: Scramble Body
ShortDescription: Your magic throws the creature's biology into disarray, inducing nausea, fever, and other unpleasant conditions.

Name: Sepulchral Mask
ShortDescription: You manifest a supernatural funerary mask, granting you a +1 status bonus to Will saving throws against emotion effects for 1 minute.

Name: Serrate
ShortDescription: With a pinch, the metal of a weapon twists, adding numerous jagged blades along its surface.

Name: Shattering Gem
ShortDescription: A large gem floats around the target in an erratic pattern.

Name: Shielding Strike
ShortDescription: As you attack a foe, warding magic transforms your momentum into action and lifts your shield.

Name: Shooting Star
ShortDescription: You let loose a projectile that flies true and leaves the blazing trail of a meteor behind it.

Name: Shroud of Night
ShortDescription: Your patron blankets the target's eyes in darkness.

Name: Snare Hopping
ShortDescription: You may not have placed your snare in the right place, but you can magically move it there.

Name: Song of Strength
ShortDescription: You bolster your allies' physical strength with a hearty exhortation.

Name: Soothing Words
ShortDescription: You attempt to calm the target by uttering soothing words in a calm and even tone.

Name: Soul Siphon
ShortDescription: You siphon off a portion of the target's soul to bolster your own vitality.

Name: Spinning Staff
ShortDescription: You spin your staff with a twirling flourish, attacking two foes and transforming the momentum into magical energy to charge for your next Spellstrike.

Name: Split the Tongue
ShortDescription: The deceiving creature's tongue splits like a serpent's tongue.

Name: Spray of Stars
ShortDescription: You fling a spray of tiny shooting stars, dealing 1d4 fire damage.

Name: Stoke the Heart
ShortDescription: Your patron fills a creature with fervor, empowering their blows.

Name: Stumbling Curse
ShortDescription: With a twist of a finger, you send a creature careening on a haphazard trajectory.

Name: Sudden Shift
Duration: until the end of your next turn
ShortDescription: You swiftly move from a dangerous spot and veil yourself.

Name: Summon Animal
ShortDescription: Conjure an animal to fight for you.

Name: Summon Construct
ShortDescription: Conjure a construct to fight on your behalf.

Name: Summon Fey
ShortDescription: Conjure a fey to fight on your behalf.

Name: Summon Instrument
ShortDescription: Call an instrument that only you can play.

Name: Summon Lesser Servitor
ShortDescription: Summon a minor celestial, monitor, or fiend.

Name: Summon Plant or Fungus
ShortDescription: Conjure a plant or fungus to fight on your behalf.

Name: Summon Undead
ShortDescription: Conjure an undead to fight on your behalf.

Name: Swampcall
ShortDescription: You call upon the spirits of the soil to twist and churn, transforming the terrain in the targeted area into a sodden mess.

Name: Sweet Dreams
ShortDescription: With soothing words, you lull the target into an enchanting dream.

Name: Synchronize Steps
ShortDescription: You link the minds of two targets, enabling them to move in tandem.

Name: Telekinetic Rend
ShortDescription: Your mind creates a violent axis of motion in a nearby space.

Name: Tempest Surge
ShortDescription: You surround a foe in a swirling storm of violent winds, roiling clouds, and crackling lightning.

Name: Tempest Touch
ShortDescription: Your touch calls forth a churning mass of icy water that clings to your target, dealing 1d4 bludgeoning damage and 1d4 cold damage.

Name: Temporal Distortion
ShortDescription: You share some of your own temporal distortions with a foe, altering their mind and body unpredictably as they're thrown backward or forward in time.

Name: Tentacular Limbs
ShortDescription: Your arms turn into long, pliable tentacles, increasing your reach when you’re delivering touch range spells and making unarmed Strikes with your arms.

Name: Thermal Stasis
Duration: until the start of your next turn
ShortDescription: The same abilities that let you raise or lower thermal energy also let you keep it at a safe medium.

Name: Thunderous Strike
ShortDescription: You swing your massive weapon, creating a wave of sonic vibrations that topples creatures.

Name: Tidal Surge
ShortDescription: You call forth a tremendous wave to move the target either in a body of water or on the ground.

Name: Torturous Trauma
ShortDescription: You batter a creature's internal organs, leaving no external signs of the immense pain you delivered.

Name: Touch of Corruption
Targets: 1 willing undead creature or 1 living creature
ShortDescription: You infuse the target with negative energy.

Name: Touch of Obedience
ShortDescription: Your imperious touch erodes the target's willpower, making it easier to control.

Name: Touch of Undeath
ShortDescription: You attack the target's life force with undeath, dealing 1d6 void damage.

Name: Undeath's Blessing
ShortDescription: You instill within a creature the touch of the grave.

Name: Unfetter Eidolon
ShortDescription: You loosen the link between yourself and your eidolon, allowing it to travel farther from you for a short period of time.

Name: Unimpeded Stride
ShortDescription: Divine grace ensure that nothing can keep you prisoner or hold you back.

Name: Unraveling Blast
ShortDescription: You unleash a small blast of potential that destroys one of a creature's possible futures, leaving them reeling.

Name: Untamed Form
ShortDescription: You reach within for a different part of yourself, and you set it free, transforming your body into another form.

Name: Untamed Shift
ShortDescription: You transform just a part of your body.

Name: Updraft
ShortDescription: A powerful blast of wind erupts from the ground, launching the target into the air and sending it crashing back down.

Name: Uplifting Overture
ShortDescription: Your performance makes allies feel they can succeed at anything.

Name: Veil of Confidence
ShortDescription: You surround yourself in confidence.

Name: Veil of Dreams
ShortDescription: Your patron draws the target into a drowsy state, causing daydreams and sluggishness.

Name: Verminous Lure
ShortDescription: Upon casting, the target emits a musk that's captivating to certain animals.

Name: Vibrant Thorns
ShortDescription: Your body sprouts brambly thorns that thrive on life magic.

Name: Waking Nightmare
ShortDescription: You fill the creature's mind with a terrifying vision.

Name: Warped Terrain
ShortDescription: You create illusory hazards that cover all surfaces in the area.

Name: Weapon Surge
Duration: until the start of your next turn
ShortDescription: Holding your weapon aloft, you fill it with divine energy.

Name: Whispering Quiet
ShortDescription: You suppress sound in an area, preventing anyone from giving away valuable secrets.

Name: Wildfire
ShortDescription: A thin layer of ash and flame covers the ground in the area.

Name: Wilding Word
ShortDescription: Your patron's majesty—or their displeasure—comes in a growl from your throat, making other creatures reluctant to harm you.

Name: Word of Truth
ShortDescription: You speak a statement that you believe to be true and that is free of any attempt to deceive through twisting words, omission, and so on.

Name: Allfood
Targets: 1 unattended non-magical object of 1 Bulk or less
ShortDescription: You transform one object into an edible substance that any living creature can chew, swallow, and safely digest.

Name: Animal Feature
ShortDescription: Without fully transforming your body, you gain one animalistic feature, which you select from the list below each time you Cast the Spell.

Name: Ash Cloud
ShortDescription: Summon a cloud of hot ash and smoke.

Name: Blazing Armory
ShortDescription: Create a weapon made of fire.

Name: Blood Duplicate
Targets: 1 non-magical object of 1 Bulk or less
ShortDescription: This spell deals you 1 piercing damage as you shape a magical duplicate of the target from your blood; you can't cast this spell if you don't have blood.

Name: Bone Spray
ShortDescription: You fire a torrent of jagged bone shards from your hands.

Name: Boneshaker
ShortDescription: You reach out a hand and seize a creature's skeleton from afar, harming their body and potentially wrenching them by the bones to move them against their will.

Name: Bralani Referendum
ShortDescription: You enforce fair play with punishing zephyrs.

Name: Breath of Drought
ShortDescription: You fill the area with an oppressive, arid swelter that overwhelms creatures with heat exhaustion.

Name: Carrion Mire
ShortDescription: The ground opens into a seemingly endless mass of corpse limbs.

Name: Charitable Urge
ShortDescription: Make a creature give away an object in its possession.

Name: Clad in Metal
Targets: 1 metal object of 5 Bulk or less that's unattended or attended by a willing creature
ShortDescription: Coat an item in a metal of your choice.

Name: Clawsong
Targets: 1 willing creature with an unarmed claw Strike
ShortDescription: You sing a fierce prayer, low and growling, and awaken the ancient spirit of a Terwa beast to guide and strengthen the target's unarmed blows.

Name: Confetti Cloud
ShortDescription: You conjure a dense storm of swirling confetti.

Name: Cutting Insult
ShortDescription: You utter an insult so offensive that it cuts your target to the quick.

Name: Dancing Shield
ShortDescription: You levitate the touched shield and orbit it around a nearby ally.

Name: Empathic Link
ShortDescription: You forge a bond between yourself and the target, enabling you to feel each other's emotions.

Name: Enlarge Companion
ShortDescription: Your animal companion grows much larger, towering over its foes in battle.

Name: Erase Trail
ShortDescription: You drastically reduce all signs of one specific creature's passage from the area, including footprints, handprints, dirt, and minor changes caused to the surrounding environment, like the bending of grass.

Name: Fear the Sun
ShortDescription: You cause the creature's vision to become particularly sensitive.

Name: Final Sacrifice
Targets: 1 creature with the minion trait that you summoned or permanently control
ShortDescription: Channel energy to blow up your minion.

Name: Grave Impressions
ShortDescription: You project a fragment of your senses into the corpse.

Name: Horrifying Blood Loss
ShortDescription: You curse the target, filling it with terror at the loss of its blood.

Name: Hunter's Luck
ShortDescription: You have a preternatural ability to remember details about your foes.

Name: Illusory Shroud
ShortDescription: You shroud the target in subtle illusions that make it difficult to detect.

Name: Imp Sting
ShortDescription: You reproduce an imp's evil, poisonous sting, stabbing at an enemy and possibly affecting them with the devil's benumbing venom.

Name: Impart Empathy
ShortDescription: You expand the target's ability to understand social cues that are normally beyond its comprehension.

Name: Impeccable Flow
ShortDescription: You attune yourself to an underlying cosmic order to the world.

Name: Instant Parade
ShortDescription: An illusory parade with dozens of participants and performers appears around you, following you as you move.

Name: Invoke the Crimson Oath
ShortDescription: Unleash a blast of ruby light, striking all before you.

Name: Lifelink Surge
ShortDescription: You make a quick gesture, tracing the link between yourself and your eidolon and drawing on your connection to slowly strengthen your shared life force.

Name: Light of Revelation
ShortDescription: Shed light, granting a bonus to Perception.

Name: Lock Item
Targets: 1 object held by 1 creature and the creature holding it
ShortDescription: One object held by a creature becomes fused to that creature's hand and can't be put down.

Name: Magic Warrior Aspect
ShortDescription: Gain the speed and senses of your totem animal.

Name: Magic Warrior Transformation
ShortDescription: transform into your totem animal.

Name: Mind Games
ShortDescription: You lock minds with the target, trying to mentally subdue them.

Name: Osseous Cage
ShortDescription: You conjure a prison made of bone.

Name: Pack Attack
ShortDescription: You and one other target gain an uncanny coordination that helps you take down foes.

Name: Penumbral Disguise
ShortDescription: You wrap the target in shadows, granting them a +1 status bonus to Stealth checks to Hide while in dim light or darkness.

Name: Perfect Strike
ShortDescription: Reroll a missed unarmed strike.

Name: Radiant Field
ShortDescription: You create an area of bright light.

Name: Rallying Anthem
ShortDescription: Your song moves allies to protect themselves more effectively.

Name: Rime Slick
ShortDescription: You call down a chill wind.

Name: Sea Surge
Duration: until the start of your next turn
ShortDescription: You slap or stomp on a nearby solid or liquid surface, sending a surge of water rushing away from you.

Name: Shadow Zombie
ShortDescription: You cast a shadow over the target zombie, briefly turning it into shadowy vapor and controlling its movement.

Name: Silence
ShortDescription: Mute all sound from a willing creature.

Name: Soothing Mist
Targets: 1 willing living creature or 1 undead creature
ShortDescription: You call forth a magical mist that envelops a creature.

Name: Sudden Bolt
ShortDescription: You call down a small bolt of lightning on the target

Name: Summon Elemental
ShortDescription: Conjure an elemental to fight on your behalf.

Name: Sun Blade
ShortDescription: Launch a bolt of divine sunfire.

Name: Swallow Light
ShortDescription: You draw magical light into your open mouth, consuming it and turning its essence into fuel for a gout of life-draining shadows.

Name: Teeth to Terror
ShortDescription: The target believes its teeth are falling out, crawling along its face, stabbing into its body, and cramming themselves down its throat.

Name: Triple Time
ShortDescription: Your music sets a fast pace.

Name: Umbral Mindtheft
ShortDescription: You prepare to steal a broad field of knowledge from another creature, siphoning it from their mind and storing it in a pocket of the Shadow Plane connected to your own mind.

Name: Undetectable Alignment
Duration: until the next time you make your daily preparations
ShortDescription: Make a creature or object appear neutral to alignment detection.

Name: Vicious Jealousy
ShortDescription: The target is overcome by deep jealousy and resentment that twists its mind against other creatures.

Name: Vision of Weakness
ShortDescription: You focus your gaze on a creature and gain a flash of divine insight into its nature.

Name: Wholeness of Body
ShortDescription: You focus your ki to heal yourself.

Name: Aberrant Whispers
ShortDescription: You utter phrases in an unknown tongue, assaulting the minds of those nearby.

Name: Access Lore
ShortDescription: You sift through the multiverse's divine knowledge, seeking out tidbits related to a particular subject.

Name: Ancestral Defense
ShortDescription: Your ancestor protects you against those who would bend your will.

Name: Angelic Wings
ShortDescription: Wings of pure light spread out from your back, granting you a fly Speed equal to your Speed.

Name: Armor of Bones
ShortDescription: You ossify your physical form, mimicking the durability of bone.

Name: Astral Rain
ShortDescription: You fling a mass of furious thoughts into the air, where they expand into numerous blades or other shapes that rain down.

Name: Battlefield Persistence
ShortDescription: You're difficult to remove from battle.

Name: Beastmaster Trance
Targets: one of your animal companions you can percieve
ShortDescription: You enter a magical trance that allows you to perceive through the senses of the target companion.

Name: Behold the Weave
ShortDescription: View the timelines to make one more likely to occur

Name: Blinding Beauty
ShortDescription: You channel the allure of your nymph bloodline into a terribly beautiful glance.

Name: Cascade Countermeasure
Duration: until the Arcane Cascade stance ends
ShortDescription: You quickly adjust your Arcane Cascade to offer magical protection.

Name: Caster's Imposition
ShortDescription: A magical interference prevents the target from contributing to any form of cooperative spellcasting.

Name: Circle of Protection
Area: 10-foot emanation centered on the touched creature
ShortDescription: A creature emits an aura that protects those within against an alignment.

Name: Combustion
ShortDescription: You ignite a creature in lasting flames.

Name: Consecrate Flesh
ShortDescription: Through the strength of your faith, your body becomes infused with holy energy.

Name: Crashing Wave
ShortDescription: Smash a cone of water against foes.

Name: Deceiver's Cloak
ShortDescription: Your patron drapes a cloak of illusion about you, making you appear as another creature of the same body shape with roughly similar height and weight as yourself.

Name: Delay Affliction
ShortDescription: With a surge of healing energy, you push back against an affliction threatening the target and grant a small amount of healing.

Name: Dirge of Doom
ShortDescription: Enemies within the area are frightened 1.

Name: Dividing Trench
ShortDescription: You dig an earthen trench across the surrounding terrain, which must be soil, clay, sand, or other soft earth, but not flooring or stone.

Name: Dragon Breath
Area: 30-foot cone or 60-foot line originating from you or 10 ft. burst within 30 ft.
ShortDescription: You spew draconic energy from your mouth.

Name: Drain Life
ShortDescription: You close your hand and pull life energy from another creature into yourself.

Name: Eidolon's Wrath
ShortDescription: Your eidolon releases a powerful energy attack.

Name: Elemental Motion
ShortDescription: You call upon your element to propel you, improving your Speed depending on your element.

Name: Embrace the Pit
ShortDescription: Devil horns grow from your skull.

Name: Entropic Wheel
ShortDescription: You stockpile thermal energy in a magical wheel-like construct that lets you burn opponents with cold or freeze their bodies with heat.

Name: Ephemeral Tracking
ShortDescription: You can look at currents in the air and water and see tracks that you can follow just as you would on land.

Name: Excise Lexicon
ShortDescription: You reach into a creature's mind and extract its knowledge of a word.

Name: Extend Spell
ShortDescription: You call upon your blood’s knowledge of the ancients to extend your magic.

Name: Eyes of the Dead
Targets: one undead creature under your control
ShortDescription: You enter a magical trance that allows you to perceive through the senses of the target creature.

Name: Familiar's Face
Targets: 1 willing creature that is your animal companion or familiar
ShortDescription: Implant your senses in your animal companion or familiar.

Name: Far Sight
ShortDescription: You can see distant objects as if they were closer.

Name: Fey Disappearance
Duration: until the end of your next turn
ShortDescription: You become invisible and ignore natural difficult terrain.

Name: Firework Blast
ShortDescription: You create a massive display of loud and colorful explosions.

Name: Gasping Marsh
ShortDescription: With a rattling hiss, you create a quickly evaporating mist of invisible poisonous marsh gas to smother creatures in the area.

Name: Ghostly Shift
ShortDescription: Your body becomes insubstantial as you partially phase out.

Name: Glass Sand
ShortDescription: You throw a handful of sand that transforms into jagged shards of glass.

Name: Gravity Well
ShortDescription: Pull all creatures towards the center of a sphere of altered gravity.

Name: Heart's Desire
ShortDescription: You surround your target with wondrous illusions of their greatest desires, which distract them from reality.

Name: Heatvision
ShortDescription: Let a creature see heat.

Name: Horrific Visage
ShortDescription: You briefly transform your features into the horrific visage of a hag, striking fear into your enemies.

Name: Incendiary Ashes
ShortDescription: A cloud of magical ashes descends upon creatures in the area.

Name: Inscrutable Mask
ShortDescription: You shroud your form and features in an impenetrable mask of shadow.

Name: Interstellar Void
ShortDescription: You call upon the frigid depths of outer space to bring a terrible chill to your enemy.

Name: Invoke the Harrow
ShortDescription: You draw a card from the harrow, either one from a deck you have in hand or magically produce one as part of the spell.

Name: Ki Blast
ShortDescription: You unleash your ki as a powerful blast of force.

Name: Levitate
ShortDescription: Float an object or creature a few feet off the ground.

Name: Life Pact
ShortDescription: Using your life force or spirit as a conduit, you bind the targets in a mystical pact.

Name: Litany Against Wrath
ShortDescription: Your litany rails against the sin of wrath, punishing the target for attacking good creatures.

Name: Locate
Targets: 1 specific object or type of object
ShortDescription: Learn the direction to an object.

Name: Magical Fetters
ShortDescription: Ghostly manacles launch from your outstretched hand and clasp around the target's limbs, impeding its movements.

Name: Malicious Shadow
ShortDescription: Your patron warps the target's shadow into a deadly form, such as strangling hands, a dangerous weapon, harrying runes, or the like.

Name: Martyr's Intervention
ShortDescription: You shield a creature in dire need with your own life force, taking the harm upon yourself to save their life.

Name: Mind Reading
Duration: 1 round or sustained up to 1 minute
ShortDescription: Read a creature's surface thoughts.

Name: Moonlight Ray
ShortDescription: You unleash a holy beam of freezing moonlight.

Name: Nothing Up My Sleeve
ShortDescription: You create an extradimensional space within each of your sleeves.

Name: Omnidirectional Scan
Duration: until the start of your next turn
ShortDescription: You quickly view your surroundings from a variety of angles, your senses constructing an overall mental picture.

Name: Painted Scout
Targets: a cave wall or other stone surface
ShortDescription: You press your hand to the stone, causing hand-drawn scouts to spread out from your fingers.

Name: Percussive Impact
ShortDescription: You lob a compressed ball of sound at a foe.

Name: Perseis's Precautions
ShortDescription: Leaving nothing to chance, you weave divinatory precautions against an ambush, alerting the target to danger.

Name: Personal Blizzard
ShortDescription: Your patron's breath becomes a blizzard of obscuring, scouring ice that follows your target.

Name: Powerful Inhalation
ShortDescription: You rapidly draw the air from your surroundings, hoarding it for yourself.

Name: Pulverizing Cascade
ShortDescription: You raise a pair of towering waves and slam them into each other, crushing creatures caught between them.

Name: Pyrotechnics
ShortDescription: You turn a fire into either a burst of blinding fireworks or a thick cloud of choking smoke

Name: Rally Point
ShortDescription: Designate a point you can teleport back to with a thought

Name: Ranger's Bramble
Area: all squares that contain plants in a 5-foot burst
ShortDescription: You cause plants in the area to entangle your foes, with the effects of _entangling flora_.

Name: Ring of Truth
ShortDescription: Ring a bell when the truth is spoken.

Name: Shadow Spy
Duration: until the next time you make your daily preparations
ShortDescription: A bird made of shadows and soil keeps watch over an area

Name: Shatter Mind
ShortDescription: You telepathically assail the minds of your foes.

Name: Shroud of Flame
ShortDescription: You encircle yourself in an aura of protective flames.

Name: Sign of Conviction
ShortDescription: You conjure the religious symbol of your deity into the air above you in the same space you stand in, wielding the power of your faith to smite your foes.

Name: Song of Marching
ShortDescription: You maintain a brisk performance that keeps allies on the move.

Name: Sparkleskin
ShortDescription: You coat a creature's body in a layer of brilliantly sparkling glitter.

Name: Spirit Veil
ShortDescription: You draw an occluding veil of spirits around yourself, blocking yourself especially well from undead eyes.

Name: Steal Shadow
ShortDescription: You steal a creature's shadow, leaving it weakened and vulnerable.

Name: Stone Lance
ShortDescription: You conjure a jagged lance of stone and then launch it at a foe.

Name: Subjugate Undead
Targets: one undead creature with a level of no more than your level - 4
ShortDescription: You attempt to seize control of the target undead.

Name: Sudden Recollection
ShortDescription: Plant information in a creature's subconscious to be revealed on a trigger you choose.

Name: Sun's Fury
Targets: 1 weapon without an _unholy_ rune that is unattended or wielded by you or a willing ally
ShortDescription: The target weapon becomes wreathed in a glowing flame.

Name: Swamp of Sloth
ShortDescription: Ground in the area turns swampy and fetid.

Name: Temporal Twin
Duration: until the end of your next turn
ShortDescription: Call a version of yourself from a recent timeline to repeat your actions

Name: Thunderburst
ShortDescription: You create a powerful blast of air and a loud peal of thunder, dealing 2d6 bludgeoning damage and 2d6 sonic damage.

Name: Time Skip
ShortDescription: You manipulate time around your ally, pushing them forward a few moments in time.

Name: Unblinking Flame Revelation
ShortDescription: Suppress illusions on your target.

Name: Unbreaking Wave Advance
ShortDescription: Unleash a blast of water to push back foes.

Name: Unfolding Wind Rush
ShortDescription: Run across the wind.

Name: Unseasonable Squall
Duration: until the start of your next turn
ShortDescription: You issue a blast of sudden wind that ripples outward from the center of the burst.

Name: Untwisting Iron Buffer
ShortDescription: Gain temporary hit points.

Name: Vector Screen
Duration: until the start of your next turn
ShortDescription: You set up a transparent, rippling screen of telekinetic energy that seizes small, fast-moving projectiles.

Name: Veil of Privacy
ShortDescription: Protect a creature or object from magical detection.

Name: Wall of Radiance
ShortDescription: You form a wall of brilliant light that obscures creatures.

Name: Wall of Shadow
ShortDescription: You form a wall of pure darkness in a straight line up to 60 feet long and 10 feet high.

Name: Wall of Virtue
ShortDescription: You create a translucent wall of light, which draws power from the celestial realms.

Name: Whirling Flames
Area: up to two 5-foot bursts that don't overlap
ShortDescription: You call forth a storm of whirling flames, engulfing all creatures in that area and dealing 5d6 fire damage with a basic Reflex save.

Name: Abundant Step
ShortDescription: You move so fast you blur across planar boundaries.

Name: Artistic Flourish
Targets: 1 item or work of art that fits entirely within the range
ShortDescription: You transform the target into a form that more closes matches your creative vision.

Name: Bursting Bloom
ShortDescription: You cause a rose bush to sprout from the chest of a foe, bursting out of its body and wrapping it in thorned vines.

Name: Call the Blood
ShortDescription: With a word and gesture, you cause streams of blood to erupt from the target's mouth, nostrils, ears, or other facial openings and come rushing into your mouth.

Name: Captivating Adoration
ShortDescription: You become intensely entrancing, and creatures are distracted by you as long as they remain within the area.

Name: Clinging Shadows Stance
ShortDescription: You adopt the stance of clinging shadows.

Name: Cloak of Light
ShortDescription: You surround yourself in holy light that restores the living and rebuffs undead.

Name: Clownish Curse
ShortDescription: You afflict the target with a curse that causes it to emit ridiculous noises as it moves.

Name: Commanding Lash
Targets: a creature you dealt damage to on your most recent action
Duration: until the end of the target's next turn
ShortDescription: With the threat of more pain, you compel a creature you've recently harmed.

Name: Community Restoration
ShortDescription: When you use your magic to support your allies, shared strength bolsters you all.

Name: Compel True Name
Targets: 1 creature whose true name you know
ShortDescription: You instruct the target to do something, compelling obedience by calling it by its true name.

Name: Competitive Edge
ShortDescription: Your competitiveness drives you to prove yourself against the opposition.

Name: Confront Selves
ShortDescription: You show the target the spiraling web of actions and consequences that is their life and the changes wrought by these decisions upon themselves and those around them.

Name: Creation
ShortDescription: Make a temporary object.

Name: Darkened Sight
ShortDescription: You infuse a creature's vision with darkness.

Name: Daydreamer's Curse
ShortDescription: You impose a curse upon the target that renders it easily distracted and unable to focus its thoughts on tasks that demand insight or discernment.

Name: Debilitating Dichotomy
ShortDescription: You reveal a glimpse of the impossible conflicts between the divine anathema behind your curse, forcing you to reckon with another's conflicts as well.

Name: Delusional Pride
ShortDescription: You make the target overconfident, leading it to ascribe failure to external factors.

Name: Destructive Aura
ShortDescription: Swirling sands of divine devastation surround you, weakening the defenses of all they touch.

Name: Detect Scrying
ShortDescription: Find out whether scrying effects are in the area.

Name: Dimensional Steps
ShortDescription: You teleport a short distance.

Name: Dirge of Remembrance
ShortDescription: You sing a funereal dirge to force restless spirits to fully manifest in the Material Plane.

Name: Discern Lies
ShortDescription: Expertly detect lies and falsehoods.

Name: Dispelling Globe
Area: 10-foot burst centered on one corner of your space
ShortDescription: Counteract magic that enters this sphere.

Name: Disperse into Air
ShortDescription: After taking the triggering damage, you transform into air.

Name: Door to Beyond
ShortDescription: Striking at thin air, you create hairline cracks in an unoccupied adjacent space that lead somewhere outside reality.

Name: Downpour
ShortDescription: You call forth a torrential downpour, which extinguishes non-magical flames.

Name: Draw the Lightning
Targets: 1 creature that is either taller than you or higher In the air than you
ShortDescription: Call down lightning into you or a weapon.

Name: Dread Aura
ShortDescription: You emit an aura of terror.

Name: Dreamer's Call
Duration: until the end of the target's next turn
ShortDescription: You create a vivid, illusory daydream drawn from the images of the target's dreams.

Name: Elemental Tempest
ShortDescription: Your spellcasting surrounds you in a storm of elemental energy.

Name: Elephant Form
ShortDescription: You channel the primal forces of nature to transform into a Large battle form, specifically that of a powerful and terrifying elephant or similar creature, such as a mammoth, mastodon, or anancus.

Name: Enduring Might
ShortDescription: Your own might mingles with divine power to protect you from harm.

Name: Energy Absorption
ShortDescription: You're used to mitigating the damage done by bombs, siege engines, and magical artillery.

Name: Enhance Senses
ShortDescription: You enhance the target's senses.

Name: Eradicate Undeath
ShortDescription: A massive deluge of life energy causes the undead to fall apart.

Name: False Nature
Targets: one unattended item or one item you're holding
ShortDescription: Rewrite perception and memory to make one object appear to be another

Name: Familiar Form
ShortDescription: You transform into a Tiny animal that commonly serves as a spellcaster's familiar.

Name: Favorable Review
ShortDescription: You enchant a creature to ensure they have only good things to say about your show.

Name: Fearful Feast
ShortDescription: You open your mouth wide and inhale sharply; you draw in the bravery, self-confidence, and hope to which the frightened target clings and then strip away the target's false assumption that these fragile emotions can save them from the oblivion of terror.

Name: Flame Barrier
Targets: one creature that would take fire damage from the triggering effect
ShortDescription: You swiftly deflect incoming flames.

Name: Forgotten Lines
ShortDescription: Restore destroyed or censored text.

Name: Fortissimo Composition
ShortDescription: You call upon your muse to greatly increase the benefits you provide with your courageous anthem, rallying anthem, or song of strength composition.

Name: Ghostly Tragedy
ShortDescription: Have spirits reenact a violent event.

Name: Girzanje's March
ShortDescription: You sing a prayer for war, inspiring valor in allies who hear your song.

Name: Glimpse the Truth
ShortDescription: Divine insight lets you see things as they are, unveiled by attempts to magically cloak the truth.

Name: Interdisciplinary Incantation
ShortDescription: You gather the embers of another caster's spell, using your understanding of unified magic to pick apart their formulas and incantations well enough to imitate the spell yourself, if only for a short time.

Name: Invisibility Cloak
ShortDescription: You become invisible, with the same restrictions as the 2nd-rank _invisibility_ spell.

Name: Isolation
ShortDescription: You summon a tangible manifestation of loneliness to cloak the target from view as surely as if it were wreathed in darkness.

Name: Know the Enemy
ShortDescription: You quickly remind yourself of useful information.

Name: Life Siphon
ShortDescription: You use some of the spell’s magic to heal yourself.

Name: Liminal Doorway
ShortDescription: A chalk door opens to an extradimensional hiding place.

Name: Localized Quake
ShortDescription: You shake the earth, toppling nearby creatures.

Name: Lucky Break
ShortDescription: Reroll the saving throw and use the better result.

Name: Magic Mailbox
Targets: 2 containers, each no larger than 5 feet in any dimension
ShortDescription: Interdimensionally link two containers.

Name: Malignant Sustenance
ShortDescription: You embed a seed of void energy in an undead creature, restoring its unnatural vigor over time.

Name: Mantis Form
ShortDescription: Transform into a mantis battle form.

Name: Mirage
ShortDescription: Disguise one natural environment as another.

Name: Misty Memory
Targets: 1 body of water of at least 5 square feet
ShortDescription: Replay a scene from the past through the medium of water.

Name: Movanic Glimmer
Duration: until you next perform your daily preparations
ShortDescription: You give the target animal a glimmer of awareness, not truly awakening it but allowing it to better understand its surroundings.

Name: Murderous Vine
Targets: 1 creature adjacent to a flat surface
ShortDescription: Grab a creature with a vine.

Name: Mystic Beacon
Duration: until the start of your next turn
ShortDescription: The next damaging or healing spell the target casts before the start of your next turn deals damage or restores Hit Points as if the spell were heightened 1 rank higher than its actual rank.

Name: Nature's Bounty
ShortDescription: A palm-sized raw fruit or vegetable of your choice appears in your open hand.

Name: Necrotic Radiation
ShortDescription: You imbue the touched object or space with slow-acting necrotic radiation.

Name: Ordained Purpose
ShortDescription: You call upon the authority of cosmic forces of order, overwhelming creatures with remorse and agony for acting outside of their station and purpose.

Name: Path of Least Resistance
ShortDescription: You trace several possible routes, quickly resetting the timeline until you find the safest one.

Name: Peaceful Bubble
ShortDescription: Opaque bubble prevents detection, dreams, perception, and scrying.

Name: Perfected Body
ShortDescription: Your body's perfection keeps you just a little bit healthier than most.

Name: Precious Metals
Targets: 1 metal shield or weapon, 1 suit of metal armor, or up to 1 Bulk of metal material (such as coins or metal-tipped ammunition)
ShortDescription: Your deity blesses base metals to transform them into precious materials.

Name: Procyal Philosophy
ShortDescription: The racoon-like visage of a sagacious procyal appears, dispensing helpful advice.

Name: Protector's Sphere
ShortDescription: A protective aura emanates out from you, safeguarding you and your allies.

Name: Pulse of Civilization
ShortDescription: You tap into the zeitgeist of any settlements in range.

Name: Radiant Beam
ShortDescription: You fire a beam of blinding light from your outstretched hands.

Name: Radiant Heart of Devotion
ShortDescription: You speak a fervent prayer for the heavens to assist you and your righteous allies.

Name: Read Omens
ShortDescription: Get a piece of advice about an upcoming event.

Name: Rebuke Death
Targets: 1 living creature per action spent to Cast this spell
ShortDescription: You snatch creatures from the jaws of death, restoring them without the strain of a typical close call.

Name: Remember the Lost
ShortDescription: You call upon the lost and forgotten, assailing your foes’ minds with the memories of those who died with a grievance toward them.

Name: Repel Metal
Targets: the creature targeted by the triggering Strike
ShortDescription: You call forth a repelling field.

Name: Replicate
Targets: 1 willing or unconscious creature of 8th level or lower
ShortDescription: Create an illusory duplicate of a creature.

Name: Retributive Pain
ShortDescription: You vengefully reflect your pain upon your tormentor.

Name: Rewrite Memory
ShortDescription: Alter, erase, or implant memories.

Name: Rune of Observation
ShortDescription: You inscribe an invisible eye-shaped rune in the air, creating a sensor as _clairvoyance_.

Name: Runic Impression
Targets: you or one weapon you're wielding
ShortDescription: Your unarmed attacks or weapon gain the benefits of a weapon rune you choose when you cast this spell.

Name: Safeguard Secret
Targets: you and any number of willing allies
ShortDescription: You ensure a secret remains safe from prying spies.

Name: Sage's Curse
ShortDescription: You afflict the target with a curse that fills its mind with distracting and hyperspecialized minutiae, causing it to second-guess even simple facts.

Name: Shared Nightmare
ShortDescription: Merging minds with the target, you swap distressing visions.

Name: Shifting Form
ShortDescription: You change your body to better suit the moment.

Name: Spiral of Horrors
ShortDescription: Shades and spirits howl and whirl around you in a display that strikes fear into the hearts of all who witness it.

Name: Spiritual Anamnesis
ShortDescription: Overwhelm a target with memories of a past life.

Name: Spiritual Attunement
ShortDescription: Attune to an aligned plane to protect yourself and harm creatures opposed to that plane.

Name: Stasis
Targets: 1 creature or up to 1 Bulk of objects
ShortDescription: The flow of time congeals around an object or creature, holding it in place.

Name: Steal Voice
ShortDescription: You steal a creature's voice, rendering them mute.

Name: Stormwind Flight
ShortDescription: Powerful winds carry you through the air, giving you a fly Speed equal to your Speed.

Name: Swarming Wasp Stings
ShortDescription: You manifest a swarm of disembodied wasp stingers that stab creatures in the area, possibly poisoning them.

Name: Take its Course
ShortDescription: When someone has overindulged, you can hasten them past the worst of their affliction or intensify their misery.

Name: Talking Corpse
ShortDescription: Have a corpse answer three questions.

Name: Tempt Fate
ShortDescription: You twist the forces of fate to make a moment dire or uneventful, with no in-between.

Name: Touch of the Moon
ShortDescription: When you touch the target, a symbol of the moon appears on its forehead, glowing with soft moonlight.

Name: Transcribe Moment
ShortDescription: You instantly create a small, permanent scroll that contains a magically precise written description of your current surroundings in every direction.

Name: Traveler's Transit
ShortDescription: You add power to your muscles, allowing you to swim or climb walls with ease.

Name: Trickster's Twin
ShortDescription: You rarely settle for being in just one place.

Name: Unity
Targets: each ally targeted by the triggering spell
ShortDescription: You put up a united defense.

Name: Variable Gravity
ShortDescription: Adjust gravity's grip between high, low, and normal gravity.

Name: Vision of Death
ShortDescription: Show the target a vision of their own death, causing fear and mental damage.

Name: Vital Luminance
ShortDescription: Drawing life force into yourself, you become a beacon of vitality.

Name: Web of Influence
ShortDescription: You learn the location of the nearest creature to whom the target is connected in a magical manner.

Name: Wild Winds Stance
ShortDescription: You take on the stance of the flowing winds, sending out waves of energy at a distance.

Name: Wood Walk
ShortDescription: Wood shapes itself according to your will readily, making staircases appear as you climb up the side of a tree, automatically weaving vines into ladders, or lowering branches to lift you up to the top.

Name: Word of Freedom
ShortDescription: You utter a liberating word of power that frees a creature.

Name: Wordsmith
Targets: 1 document written by a single author and comprised of written text in a single language
Duration: until the next time you Refocus
ShortDescription: You're a devotee of knowledge with an unmatched command of the language used to spread that knowledge, and you can reshape the written word into a form more understandable to your audience.

Name: Zeal for Battle
ShortDescription: You stoke the righteous anger within yourself and an ally.

Name: Abyssal Wrath
ShortDescription: You evoke the energy of an Abyssal realm.

Name: Arcane Countermeasure
Targets: the spell cast by the triggering creature
ShortDescription: You undermine the target spell, making it easier to defend against.

Name: Belittling Boast
ShortDescription: You boast about your skills or combat prowess, bolstering your own abilities and belittling your opponents.

Name: Blackfinger's Blades
Targets: up to 4 weapons, each wielded by a separate willing creature within range
ShortDescription: You pray for swift and painful death to your enemies and find your and your allies' weapons blessed to deliver just that.

Name: Blind Eye
Duration: until the next time you make your daily preparations
ShortDescription: You enchant a single object, preventing it from being used for magical observation.

Name: Blinding Foam
ShortDescription: You spray a colorful, caustic foam into the target's eyes, which clings to their face.

Name: Blood Feast
ShortDescription: Your head splits vertically into an enormous maw, which feasts upon the target's blood.

Name: Celestial Brand
ShortDescription: A blazing symbol appears on the target, marking it for divine justice.

Name: Cleansing Flames
ShortDescription: You wrap the target in purifying flames.

Name: Consuming Darkness
ShortDescription: Your shadow wriggles before spreading out from you, forming a gateway of clinging, consuming shadow through which the horrors of another plane can barely be seen.

Name: Contagious Idea
Targets: 1 or 2 creatures other than yourself (see text)
ShortDescription: Nothing is so contagious as a thought.

Name: Curse of Death
ShortDescription: Your patron wraps a hand around your target's heart.

Name: Dance of Darkness
ShortDescription: You dance, Striding up to half your Speed.

Name: Dancing Blade
ShortDescription: You telekinetically animate a weapon that's unattended or on your person.

Name: Desperate Repair
ShortDescription: You hold a shield together with the power of your magic, forcing wood and steel to fuse back together.

Name: Dragon Wings
ShortDescription: Draconic wings sprout from your back.

Name: Drop Dead
ShortDescription: The target appears to die but actually turns invisible.

Name: Ectoplasmic Expulsion
ShortDescription: You call upon tendrils of ephemeral ectoplasm to pass through the target and carry away a harmful psychic affliction.

Name: Elemental Blast
ShortDescription: You gather elemental energy and blast your foes.

Name: Engrave Memory
ShortDescription: Store memories in a stone.

Name: Establish Ward
ShortDescription: You bind a part of your essence to your surroundings, creating a warded area that grants you power within it, but drains you outside of it.

Name: False Vision
ShortDescription: Trick a scrying spell.

Name: Fey Glamour
ShortDescription: You call upon fey glamours to cloak an area or the targets in illusion.

Name: Fire's Pathway
ShortDescription: Teleport from fire to fire.

Name: Foresee the Path
ShortDescription: You see just a split second into the future and glean how an enemy will move, making it easier for your allies to strike it mid-action.

Name: Grasping Grave
ShortDescription: Hundreds of skeletal arms erupt from the ground in the area, clawing at creatures within and attempting to hold them in place.

Name: Hellfire Plume
ShortDescription: You call forth a plume of hellfire that erupts from below.

Name: Hologram Cage
ShortDescription: You weave light into a cube of vivid and fantastic patterns.

Name: House of Imaginary Walls
ShortDescription: You mime an invisible 10-foot-by-10-foot wall adjacent to you and within your reach.

Name: Hunter's Vision
ShortDescription: Your target glows with a magical aura visible only to you and those who follow your lead.

Name: Incendiary Fog
ShortDescription: You summon a cloud of flammable black dust.

Name: Infectious Comedy
ShortDescription: You tell a magical joke and infect a target with laughter that spreads to those nearby.

Name: Lashunta's Life Bubble
ShortDescription: You create a replenishing protective bubble of fresh, temperate air around the target.

Name: Litany against Sloth
ShortDescription: Your litany rails against the sin of sloth, interfering with the target’s ability to react.

Name: Litany of Self-Interest
ShortDescription: You give a speech that fills your target with a drive to improve themself to the exclusion of assisting others.

Name: Magic Passage
Area: 5-foot-wide, 10-foot-tall, 10-foot-deep section of wooden, plaster, or stone wall
ShortDescription: Open a temporary passage through a surface.

Name: Mind Probe
ShortDescription: Uncover knowledge and memories in a creature's mind.

Name: Mirecloak
ShortDescription: You wrap the targeted creatures in thin, sickly green shrouds that sap information from attackers.

Name: Nature's Pathway
ShortDescription: Teleport from tree to tree.

Name: Ode to Ouroboros
ShortDescription: Your ode staves off death.

Name: Pillars of Sand
ShortDescription: Create pillars of sand.

Name: Rallying Banner
ShortDescription: You create an illusory banner representing a revolution, social movement, or organization such as the Firebrands.

Name: Ravening Maw
ShortDescription: You evoke Zevgavizeb’s unceasing hunger and inflict it upon your target.

Name: Redistribute Potential
ShortDescription: Energy attempts to balance out, but with your magic, you can shunt all the energy in one area to another.

Name: Restorative Moment
ShortDescription: Your patron weaves the threads of time around the target, giving them some of the benefits of a day's passage.

Name: Return Beacon
ShortDescription: You create a unique planar beacon somewhere within the spell's range that remains in place.

Name: Rewrite Possibility
ShortDescription: You continually glimpse into the target's future and nudge fate to guide them toward the best possible outcome.

Name: Ritual Obstruction
ShortDescription: You establish a zone of magical feedback that makes it impossible to succeed at rituals of this spell's level or lower in the area.

Name: Scouring Pulse
ShortDescription: You inundate the area with concentrated positive energy, which scours away the stain of undeath.

Name: Shadow Jump
ShortDescription: You instantly transport yourself from one shadow to another.

Name: Shepherd of Souls
ShortDescription: You stay the hand of fate for one not yet destined to die, sacrificing some of your own vitality to heal them.

Name: Soulshelter Vessel
Targets: 1 willing creature and 1 non-magical stone object of 1 or 2 Bulk
ShortDescription: You connect the spirit of the target creature with the target object, giving their spirit a durable vessel that protects and empowers their body.

Name: Spellmaster's Ward
ShortDescription: You create one or more glowing protective runes that revolve around you.

Name: Spiritual Guardian
