ShortDescription: Create a magical guardian to attack at your command and take damage for your allies.

Name: Spiritual Torrent
ShortDescription: You release your spiritual essence in a torrential blast of energy, dealing 10d6 damage.

Name: Steal the Sky
ShortDescription: You deny a flying creature the support of the air.

Name: Stormburst
ShortDescription: Your voice projects like cracking thunder as you summon a localized storm, creating a fearsome surge of lightning and wind.

Name: Summon Anarch
ShortDescription: Summon a chaotic celestial, monitor, or fiend.

Name: Summon Axiom
ShortDescription: Summon a lawful celestial, monitor, or fiend.

Name: Summon Celestial
ShortDescription: Conjure a celestial to fight for you.

Name: Summon Dragon
ShortDescription: Conjure a dragon to fight on your behalf.

Name: Summon Entity
ShortDescription: Conjure an aberration to fight on your behalf.

Name: Summon Fiend
ShortDescription: Conjure a fiend to fight on your behalf.

Name: Summon Giant
ShortDescription: Conjure a giant to fight on your behalf.

Name: Summon Healing Servitor
Duration: until the end of your next turn
ShortDescription: You call forth a servitor forged from raw positive energy to heal and bolster your allies.

Name: Summon Monitor
ShortDescription: Conjure a planar monitor to fight on your behalf.

Name: Symphony of the Unfettered Heart
ShortDescription: Your symphony lifts listeners from their worldly concerns.

Name: Telepathic Bond
Targets: you and up to 4 willing creatures touched
ShortDescription: Link minds with willing creatures to communicate telepathically at great distances.

Name: Terrain Transposition
ShortDescription: You mystically transpose your current location with another.

Name: Tesseract Tunnel
ShortDescription: You race from point to point, tearing open a tunnel in space.

Name: Truespeech
ShortDescription: Let a creature understand and speak all languages.

Name: Umbral Journey
Targets: you and up to 10 willing creatures touched
ShortDescription: Travel rapidly via the Netherworld.

Name: Unblinking Flame Aura
ShortDescription: You focus your sight inside and call on your inner fire to grant you warmth, steady your vision, and soothe your body.

Name: Unbreaking Wave Vapor
ShortDescription: You're concealed against the triggering attack and gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against it.

Name: Unfolding Wind Buffet
ShortDescription: You surround your unarmed attacks with the speed and force of air.

Name: Untwisting Iron Roots
ShortDescription: You manipulate the earth beneath your feet to throw your enemies off balance, leaving chunks of rock and rubble behind.

Name: Unusual Anatomy
ShortDescription: You transform your flesh and organs into a bizarre amalgam.

Name: Wind Jump
ShortDescription: You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed.

Name: Wisdom of the Winds
ShortDescription: Ask air spirits for guidance.

Name: Wish-Twisted Form
ShortDescription: You focus your magic upon an enemy, wishing for their defenses to fail and turning their strengths into weaknesses.

Name: Wronged Monk's Wrath
ShortDescription: You unleash your ki as a powerful storm of force and lightning.

Name: Wyvern Sting
ShortDescription: You duplicate the venomous sting of a wyvern.

Name: You're Mine
ShortDescription: You manipulate the target’s emotions, potentially allowing you to control it for a brief instant.

Name: Ancestral Form
ShortDescription: You take the form of your ancestral spirits, becoming invisible and quasi-corporeal.

Name: Ash Form
ShortDescription: You take the form of a cloud of minuscule ash particles.

Name: Aura of the Unremarkable
ShortDescription: You and allies in the area appear to be completely innocuous to other creatures within the spell's area, regardless of the actions you're committing.

Name: Blanket of Stars
ShortDescription: A cloak of darkness hides you in the dark and dazzles those who get too close.

Name: Bound in Death
ShortDescription: You tether another creature's spirit to your own, shunting part of the damage dealt to you onto one of your foes.

Name: Champion's Sacrifice
ShortDescription: You form a link with an ally, allowing you to take harm in their stead.

Name: Claim Undead
ShortDescription: You attempt to wrest control of a target undead or force it to recognize you as its master.

Name: Dominate
ShortDescription: A creature must obey your orders.

Name: Dragon Form
ShortDescription: Turn into a dragon.

Name: Dread Secret
Duration: until the start of your next turn
ShortDescription: You utter a powerful secret at odds with the fundamental nature of the target creatures.

Name: Flaming Fusillade
ShortDescription: You call upon an endless barrage of flames, producing miniature fireballs in your hands to hurl at foes.

Name: For Love, For Lightning
ShortDescription: When you Cast the Spell, you plunge the required weapon into the ground, where it crackles with crimson lightning.

Name: Gray Shadow
ShortDescription: You pray over a dying creature, drawing its shadow into your service as long as its owner is stooped at death's door.

Name: Hag's Fruit
ShortDescription: You imbue a single piece of fruit with a curse that leaves its victims in a magical sleep.

Name: Heinous Future
ShortDescription: You hold up fractured mirror to the target, and in that mirror it sees a thing that may yet come to pass.

Name: Heroic Feat
ShortDescription: You gain the ability to perform a specialized combat technique from the vast wealth of martial knowledge your mystery provides.

Name: Life-Giving Form
ShortDescription: You transcend your physical form, becoming a beacon of healing energy.

Name: Lure Dream
ShortDescription: You reach out to the dream realm, beckoning an animate dream to your side.

Name: Manifold Lives
ShortDescription: You cast a creature's mind back through time, forcing them to take other paths and make other choices, experiencing countless alternate lives in an instant.

Name: Mantle of Heaven's Slopes
ShortDescription: You surround yourself in a mantle of heavenly power, invoking the power of the layers of the celestial mountain above.

Name: Moonlight Bridge
ShortDescription: You summon a bridge of radiant, shimmering moonlight.

Name: Primal Summons
ShortDescription: You enhance a summoned creature with the power of the elements.

Name: Raise Dead
Targets: 1 dead creature of 13th level or lower
ShortDescription: Return a dead creature to life.

Name: Ravenous Darkness
ShortDescription: You create a shroud of magical darkness that feeds on those inside it.

Name: Rose's Thorns
ShortDescription: Rose bushes with razor-sharp thorns sprout from the ground in the area.

Name: Scrying
ShortDescription: Spy on a creature you choose.

Name: Shadow Illusion
ShortDescription: You create a shadowy illusion of a creature or a stationary object, but the illusion can exist only in an area of dim light or darkness.

Name: Shambling Horror
Targets: 1 corpse of a Gargantuan or smaller creature that has a level no greater than your level – 4 and has died since the last sunrise
ShortDescription: You reanimate the corpse of a fallen creature as an undead minion under your control.

Name: Speaking Sky
ShortDescription: The air speaks to you.

Name: Suffocate
Targets: 1 living creature that needs to breathe
ShortDescription: You forcefully and cruelly draw the living breath from a creature's lungs, dealing 4d8 bludgeoning damage.

Name: Teleport
Targets: you and up to 4 targets touched, either willing creatures or objects roughly the size of a creature
ShortDescription: Transport you and willing creatures a great distance.

Name: Tempest Form
ShortDescription: Your body becomes fluid to better suit your surroundings.

Name: Word of Revision
ShortDescription: As all good writers know, you shouldn't kill off your protagonist before their story is complete.

Name: Zero Gravity
ShortDescription: Remove gravity in an area.

Name: Allegro
ShortDescription: You perform rapidly, speeding up your ally.

Name: Blightburn Blast
ShortDescription: Inflict a creature with blightburn sickness.

Name: Control Sand
ShortDescription: Manipulate sand around you.

Name: Curse of the Spirit Orchestra
ShortDescription: You summon an invisible, insubstantial group of extraplanar musicians who follow the target and play distracting music to hinder its actions.

Name: Dancing Fountain
ShortDescription: Tap a splendid fountain with majestic displays you command.

Name: Darklight
ShortDescription: Shadows pour forth from your eyes, creating a field of darkness that prevents light from emanating within the area.

Name: Duplicate Foe
ShortDescription: Create a temporary duplicate of an enemy to fight for you.

Name: Entrancing Eyes
ShortDescription: Your eyes glow with an entrancing radiance that captivates those who meet your gaze.

Name: Ethereal Jaunt
ShortDescription: Use the Ethereal Plane to move through objects and into the air.

Name: Hasted Assault
ShortDescription: You call upon your magic to speed up your attacks.

Name: Interplanar Teleport
ShortDescription: Transport creatures to another plane in the Multiverse.

Name: Leng Sting
ShortDescription: You use the power of nightmares to magically replicate the venomous attack of the aberrant and cunning Leng spiders.

Name: Litany of Depravity
ShortDescription: Your litany calls into question the morals your foe claims to hold dear.

Name: Litany of Righteousness
ShortDescription: Your litany denounces an evildoer, rendering it susceptible to the powers of good.

Name: Maze of Locked Doors
ShortDescription: The target of your spell is drawn into a long, twisting, extradimensional hallway.

Name: Moonburst
ShortDescription: A powerful globe of chilling moonlight explodes in the area, dealing 8d10 cold damage to creatures and objects in the area, plus 8d10 additional positive damage to undead creatures.

Name: Planar Palace
ShortDescription: Conjure a secure dwelling in a demiplane.

Name: Planar Seal
ShortDescription: Raise a barrier against teleportation and summoning.

Name: Possession
ShortDescription: Send your mind and soul into another creature's body.

Name: Power Word Blind
ShortDescription: Utter a word that blinds a creature.

Name: Reverse Gravity
ShortDescription: Flip the gravitational pull in an area.

Name: Shadow's Web
ShortDescription: Grasping darkness surges from you, dealing 14d4 negative damage.

Name: Soothing Ballad
ShortDescription: You draw upon your muse to soothe your allies.

Name: Spell Turning
ShortDescription: Reflect spells back at their caster.

Name: Unblinking Flame Emblem
ShortDescription: You emblazon the target with a fiery sigil that projects your sight and your flame onto them, allowing you and your allies to track their movements and making it easier to hit them.

Name: Unbreaking Wave Barrier
ShortDescription: You create a protective circle around yourself that repels your foes.

Name: Unfolding Wind Blitz
ShortDescription: You blitz forward so quickly that you soar through the air, and nothing can react to you.

Name: Untwisting Iron Augmentation
ShortDescription: Your unarmed attacks are treated as cold iron and silver, they gain the earth trait, and they gain a +1 status bonus to damage rolls per damage die.

Name: Clone Companion
ShortDescription: Create a duplicate animal companion that mirrors your companion's actions.

Name: Deluge
ShortDescription: You unleash a catastrophic downpour in the area that vanishes an instant later.

Name: Devour Life
ShortDescription: You attempt to utterly consume the target's life force.

Name: Hidden Mind
ShortDescription: Protect a creature from mental magic and effects that pry into its secrets.

Name: Impaling Briars
ShortDescription: The ground within the area transforms into a mass of dangerous briars that assault and impede your foes.

Name: Medusa's Wrath
ShortDescription: You make an attack filled with a medusa's petrifying power.

Name: Migration
Targets: you and up to 5 willing creatures
ShortDescription: Turn creatures into swift-moving animals.

Name: Pinpoint
ShortDescription: Learn the exact location of a creature or object.

Name: Power Word Stun
ShortDescription: Utter a word that stuns a creature.

Name: Prying Survey
ShortDescription: You create eight invisible, floating eyes, each about 3 inches in diameter, that scan the area around you, transmitting rough impressions of the environment.

Name: Quivering Palm
ShortDescription: Your strikes can kill foes with a precise and powerful strike.

Name: Summon Archmage
Duration: until the end of your next turn
ShortDescription: Summon an incarnate archmage to fire magic missiles, stupefy foes, and tear away their spells.

Name: Summon Deific Herald
Duration: until the end of your next turn
ShortDescription: Summon an incarnate representative of your deity, with effects depending on alignment.

Name: Summon Elemental Herald
Duration: until the end of your next turn
ShortDescription: Summon an incarnate elemental to create a natural disaster.

Name: Summon Irii
Duration: until the end of your next turn
ShortDescription: Summon a guardian from the Dimension of Time to enforce either immutability or possibility

Name: Undermine Reality
ShortDescription: You lash a target with tendrils of shadow that steal some of its substance, making it quasi-real.

Name: Astral Labyrinth
ShortDescription: You connect the entire area with an invisible maze of astral energy that interferes with dimensional and mental magic.

Name: Crusade
ShortDescription: Creatures become dedicated to a cause of your choice.

Name: Detonate Magic
ShortDescription: Cause a spell or item to explode.

Name: Empty Body
ShortDescription: You turn ethereal, with the effects of ethereal jaunt, but you don’t need to concentrate.

Name: Ki Form
ShortDescription: Drawing from deep wells of spiritual power, you take on a special ki form.

Name: Linnorm Sting
ShortDescription: You replicate the fiery venom of the tor linnorm and inflict an enemy with the dread dragon's debilitating bite.

Name: Power Word Kill
ShortDescription: Utter a word that slays a creature.

Name: Seize Soul
Targets: 1 creature that died within the last minute
ShortDescription: Trap a soul in an item.

Name: Storm Lord
ShortDescription: The sky above you darkens in a matter of moments, swirling with ominous clouds punctuated by flashes of lighting.

Name: Summon Ancient Fleshforged
Duration: until the end of your next turn
ShortDescription: You summon an ancient Fleshforged, one of Nex's personal weaponized monstrosities unleashed in the first wars against Geb.

Name: Summon Draconic Legion
Duration: until the end of your next turn
ShortDescription: Summon an incarnate legion of dragons to destroy your foes.

Name: Unblinking Flame Ignition
ShortDescription: You feel the most alive when pushed into a corner, as the insights and vision granted by the flame stoke into overdrive.

Name: Unbreaking Wave Containment
ShortDescription: You wrap enemies in four strands of water.

Name: Unfolding Wind Crash
ShortDescription: You jump up to 120 feet in any direction and then deal 18d6 bludgeoning damage to creatures within a 20-foot emanation after you land, with a basic Reflex save.

Name: Untwisting Iron Pillar
ShortDescription: You call upon the earth and your ki to shield you from your enemies.

Name: Upheaval
ShortDescription: The ground in the area shudders and crumbles as huge pillars of stone erupt into the air, rending the terrain around them.

Name: Voracious Gestalt
ShortDescription: Create a spirit gestalt that eats souls and grows stronger.

Name: Alter Reality
ShortDescription: Warp reality to duplicate occult spells.

Name: Apex Companion
ShortDescription: Transform your animal companion into an apex form.

Name: Fatal Aria
ShortDescription: You perform music so perfect that the target may die of joy or sorrow.

Name: Fated Confrontation
ShortDescription: Isolate two fated opponents and let them twist each other's fate.

Name: Gate
ShortDescription: Tear open a portal to another plane.

Name: Hero's Defiance
ShortDescription: You shout in defiance, filling you with a sudden burst of healing.

Name: Manifestation
ShortDescription: Flexibly cast a 9th-rank spell from your tradition.

Name: Miracle
ShortDescription: Ask for a blessing to duplicate divine spells.

Name: Pied Piping
ShortDescription: Your performance enraptures listeners, compelling them to follow you.

Name: Primal Phenomenon
ShortDescription: Request for nature to duplicate primal spells.

Name: Remake
ShortDescription: Recreate a destroyed object.

Name: Song of the Fallen
Targets: up to 4 dead creatures or up to 4 undead creatures
ShortDescription: Rouse the dead or smite the undead.

Name: Summon Kaiju
Duration: until the end of your next turn
ShortDescription: Summon an incarnate kaiju with effects depending on the specific kaiju.

Name: Wish
ShortDescription: Make a wish to duplicate arcane spells.
